mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rno, fid, fpname, flocation, fpeople, cnt fcnt, rservice fservice, fsido, fgugun from facility_list where fsido like '%'||#{sido}||'%' and fgugun like '%'||#{gugun}||'%' and fpname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') where rno between #{start} and #{end}
select count(*) from facility_list where fsido like '%'||#{sido}||'%' and fgugun like '%'||#{gugun}||'%' and fpname like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select * from (select rownum rno, fid, fpname, fservice from (select fid, fpname, nvl(rservice, 0.0) fservice from facility_list order by fservice desc)) where rno between 1 and 5
